posts.message:
السلام عليكم, كنت شغال بقالى فترة على chess engine برنامج ذكاء اصطناعى بيلعب شطرنج, ب C++ 
 
هو UCI engine فبتعامل مع external GUI ومن اشهرال GUIs هو chess arena فمحتاج تحمله لو حابب تجرب ال engine : 
http://www.playwitharena.com/?Download
 
وده ال engine :
http://www.mediafire.com/file/jkkw3yrjky2936m/Little_Lelouch_01.exe 

برنامج arena هو windows app لو مهتم وحابب تجربه وانت linux هتضطر تحمل wine وشغال عليه تمام, باقى البرامج كان فيها بعض المشاكل عل linux فده الى حاليا ال engine  شغال عليه كويس 
https://www.winehq.org/download/ 

بعد ماتحمل arena بتختار install new engine من "Engines" وت select ال engine وعشان تحدد الوقت بتختار من "Levels" الى جنبها الوقت والزيادة بالثوانى 20/30 يعنى 20 دقيقة مع زيادة 30 ثانية مع كل حركة

الكود لو حد حابب يشوفه انا حاولت اكتب comments بقدر الامكان لشرح الامر,الموضوع كان حقيقى مفيد بالنسبالى وليه مصادر كويسة للشرح
https://github.com/AbdelrhmanIbrahim/Little_Lelouch_01

صورة لتوضيح بعض الحاجات ف arena : 
http://imgur.com/a/8bOD6 

notes : 
1) this is not stockfish, it's my very first chess engine so you can lower your expectations 
2) no en-passant move implemented in this version yet
3) some of the algorithms for those whom are interested to read about how strategy board games engines: 

a) alpha-beta search
b) iterative deepening search
c) moves ordering using principle variation ,most valuable victim-least valuable attacker,killer moves, history heuristic and positional score
d) null move search
e) aspiration window
f) quiescence search
g) zobrist hashing
h) transposition table
k) hyperbola quintessence
l) the position evaluation (I see that this can depend on your chess experience)

لو حد هيجربه ويلاعبه ياريت يقول ايه العيوب او المشاكل الى فيه وشكرا جزيلا.

posts.description: We're pleased to announce the open source release of Yarn, a new JavaScript package manager built in collaboration with Exponent, Google, and Tilde. With Yarn, engineers have access to the npm registry, but can install packages faster, more securely, and more reliably. Yarn enables engineers to move faster and with confidence when using shared code so they can focus on what matters — building new products and features.

posts.message:
hello geeks,
i have a question ...
i made a framework of applications ... its something private that i have been working on.
so in order to put it in action i needed 2 pc's running windows server.

it consists of several nodes

main_node <-> security node <-> auth_node <-> Node_Manager <-> gateway

Node_Manager:
->client_node <-> launches the nodes 1~x the the same server for client_node.
->Node 1
->Node 2
->Node 3
etc ....

the problem is that my client_node could be launched several times.
when i made it i designed it that way for security reason and load balancing

so when ever i launch the client_node the Node_Manager asks for both (internal ip,wan ip)
and starts to manage the session encryption between every node (its dynamic for every node depends on the time/ip subnets)

so i can not launch the client_node more that one time on the same system because of the ip subnet and nodes mutex.

i ran it on a vps.
what i need is to make the windows act like if it has another Ethernet adapter with another ip to force the node to create
different mutex.

so here is what i have tried
- a vm system hosting windows server and i tried all types of ethernet config available
- external vpn which worked fine except the node asks for a local ip to connect back to.
- a loopback adapter
- a proxy hosted on another system except it asks for a local ip
- creating a system hook service and push back every packet to the buffer as a temp fix but it didn't work because of my in-app virtualization
- creating custom firewall routes using powershell

i suffered from that problem for weeks,
so any suggestions?

thanks!
